title: Screen randomly freezing
body: Ever since the last patch my screen has been randomly freezing in game and the only solution is to play on a smaller windowed screen. The client did have a warning about this a few days ago but it has been removed so I am assuming that riot believes the problem is fixed yet I am still getting the random frozen screen.

replies.body: Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your issue.  The issue with fullscreen should have been resolved, so we'd like to work with you individually to fix this up.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
